item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Jess,<br/><br/><br/><br/>I think there's a real risk of that. What you'll need to do is go to your latest backup of the internet and see if you can restore it from there <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a> alt=""/> <br/><br/><br/><br/>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Jess,

I think there’s a real risk of that. What you’ll need to do is go to your latest backup of the internet and see if you can restore it from there http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“ alt=””/>

Matt

item.title: By: Jess Stratton
item.dc:creator: Jess Stratton
item.description: <p>Man, I didn't save the web page I was working on my own site. Does that mean I'm going to lose it? <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJV/$FILE/laugh.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded: Man, I didn’t save the web page I was working on my own site. Does that mean I’m going to lose it? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJV/$FILE/laugh.gif“>

item.title: By: Phillip Deftereos
item.dc:creator: Phillip Deftereos
item.description: <p>Excellent! Might take a while to re-boot the whole thing !</p>
item.content:encoded: Excellent! Might take a while to re-boot the whole thing !
